story.text: (Adds 2007 outlook) Jan 3 (Reuters) - IMMUCOR INC. BLUD.O Latest Forecast* No. of Yr ago analysts qtr EPS (diluted, $/shr) 0.20 -- -- 0.11 Net ($ million) 14.1 -- -- 8.1 Net sales ($ million) 54.4 51.6 3 44.0 *Source: Reuters Estimates --The company, which provides blood transfusion instruments, said its latest quarter results included option expense of $0.7 million. --For the latest second quarter, three analysts on average had expected the company to earn 18 cents a share, before exceptional items, according to Reuters Estimates. --The company raised its 2007 earnings outlook to 75 cents to 78 cents a share from its previous view of 69 cents to 74 cents a share. --The company said it now expects 2007 revenue of $214 million to $218 million, compared with previous outlook of $204 million to $212 million. --For 2007, three analysts on average expect the company to earn 77 cents a share, before exceptional items, on revenue of $215 million.
